metadata.title: CVE-2021-41682 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: There is a heap-use-after-free at ecma-helpers-string.c:1940 inecma_compare_ecma_non_direct_strings in JerryScript 2.4.0

criterions.comment: iotjs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
